HelpXML.Title: brushROB
HelpXML.Purpose: brushROB displays a GUI which enables brushing in resindexplot
HelpXML.Description: brushROB displays a GUI to brush units from the index plot of residualsand see the corresponding units highlighted in the yXplot

Item.Name: eventdata
Item.TypeInd: Automatic code execution without user interaction.
Item.LongDesc: This option enables to perform in an automatic way the code associated with a particular radiobutton in the GUI
Item.Example: 2 (the example associated with the second radiobutton will be automatically executed)

References.Item: Tufte E.R. (1983). The visual display of quantitative information. Graphics Press, Cheshire

Item.Title: Interactive example 1. Display a GUI to brush units from the index plot of residuals and see the corresponding units highlighted in the yXplot.
Run examples associated with radiobuttons 1 to 6.
